https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rjWTWWt6nWNg0IqxiY2N5EANRLm.jpg Story of the 1974 coup that overthrew the right-wing Portuguese dictatorship--which continued the fascist policies of long-time dictator Antonio Salazar--and of two young army captains who were involved in it. Captains of April
